# SEINet Data

## Cleaning data and removing potential duplicates
The code below should be run after you have downloaded datasets for each of the islands, and the special terms searches, in both the CCH2 and SEINet databases.

****
To begin, use ctrl+F to find and *replace all* of the previous dates (for instance, "Dec 2020") with the new date ("Mar 2020").
